review: I am very impressed so far with the Fire Stick, it works much better on my Sony non WiFi set than the onboard WiFi works on a much newer Samsung. Great picture quality, good interface, Very quick to load, and the remote is well designed and intuitive to use.I may end up getting another for my other set if the new router Xfinity sends is not any better than the current one. Xfinity has been a BIG disappointment, BTW, but I am basically stuck as it is part of a package negotiated by my HOA.
